column2: too many to list! I have a few Pi3/4 and CM3/4 based devices as well as most Anbernic
PowKiddy & Miyoo devices. Also AYN Odin Pro
and a few GPD devices including the XD
Win2 and Pocket2. I go as far back as the Dingoo A320  :D
